com.dautelle.realtime
Interface Realtime

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
Operable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Complex, Function, LargeInteger, Matrix, Numerics.Float32, Numerics.Float64, Quantity, Rational, Real, RealtimeNumber, RealtimeObject
public interface Realtime
extends java.io.Serializable

This interface identifies classes with higher performance and higher predictability when their methods are executed within a (@link PoolContext}.

Classes implementing this interface can be allocated on the stack and do not generate garbage.

Version:
6.0, February 15, 2004
Author:
Jean-Marie Dautelle

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object export()
          Exports this object out of the current pool context.
 java.lang.Object toHeap()
          Moves this object to the heap.
 

Method Detail

export

public java.lang.Object export()
Exports this object out of the current pool context. Realtime members are exported as well (recursion).

Returns:
this

toHeap

public java.lang.Object toHeap()
Moves this object to the heap. Realtime members are moved to the heap as well (recursion).

Returns:
this
